name: Never Have I Ever
description: Never Have I Ever is a popular party game. Players take turns making statements about things they have never done. Any player who has done the thing in the statement must take a penalty, usually a drink.
basicRules: One player starts by saying 'Never have I ever...' followed by something they have never done.
Anyone who has done that thing must take a drink.
The game continues with the next person in the circle making a statement.
The game can also be played with points instead of drinks. For example, players could start with 10 points and lose a point each time they have done something.
tips: Start with tame statements and get more adventurous as the game goes on.
This game can be a great way to learn surprising things about your friends.
